global.name: Enter name
global.hero: Crafting Fabulous Kitchens with care and passion
global.open2: Kitchen Home is now open at Arkan Plaza. Check out the variety of luxurious stainless steel & wooden kitchens.

alert.notConfirm: Please fill in all the fields.

classic.title: Classic Kitchen
classic.snippet: A timeless design that combines elegance with functionality.

cards.title: Beige and Wood Finish
cards.snippet: This classic kitchen blends warm beige tones with natural wood accents.

cards.title: Marble Countertops
cards.snippet: Featuring elegant marble countertops, this kitchen exudes luxury and comfort.

cards.title: Traditional Cabinetry
cards.snippet: Classic wooden cabinetry with detailed finishes gives this kitchen a timeless look.

modern.title: Modern Kitchen
modern.snippet: A sleek and minimalist design focused on functionality and clean lines.

cards.title: High-Gloss Cabinets
cards.snippet: Ultra-modern, high-gloss cabinets give this kitchen a sophisticated look.

cards.title: Stainless Steel Appliances
cards.snippet: This kitchen features the latest in stainless steel appliances for a modern touch.

cards.title: Open-Concept Design
cards.snippet: An open-concept layout with sleek surfaces and minimal decor.

contemporary.title: Contemporary Kitchen
contemporary.snippet: Blends modern elements with unique, artistic touches for a bold look.

cards.title: Bold Color Accents
cards.snippet: This kitchen features a mix of modern elements with bold color accents for a vibrant look.

cards.title: Mixed Materials
cards.snippet: A combination of wood, metal, and stone gives this kitchen an eclectic, contemporary feel.

cards.title: Unique Lighting Fixtures
cards.snippet: Eye-catching lighting fixtures add a unique touch to this kitchen.

reservations.noReservationsYet: No reservations yet. Make a reservation by selecting a kitchen.
